tokens.text: detects content that duplicates vanilla Minecraft files

title: Vanilla Duplicates
description: Detects content that duplicates vanilla Minecraft files. Unnecessary copies increase pack size and may cause conflicts with game updates.

fields.title: Exact Duplicate
fields.description: Error when a file is an exact copy of a vanilla Minecraft file. This wastes space and may cause issues when the vanilla file is updated. Remove the duplicate.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the path to the duplicated vanilla file

fields.title: Partial Duplicate
fields.description: Warning when a file appears to be a mostly-unchanged copy of vanilla content with minor modifications. Consider using only the necessary overrides rather than duplicating the entire file.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the path to the partial duplicate and similarity percentage
